Name: Variables - Substitute in Files
Description: Transforms files using the Octopus `#{Variable}` substitution syntax.

Parameters.Name: SubsTemplatePathGlobs
Parameters.Label: Template files
Parameters.HelpText:
A semicolon-separated list of path expressions that match the template files to be processed.

Simple globbing is supported, for example `C:\Files\**\*.tmpl` will match files in `C:\Files` and any subdirectory.

Parameters.Name: SubsTrimSuffix
Parameters.Label: Trim filename suffix
Parameters.HelpText:
If specified, the results of evaluating the templates will be written to new files by trimming the specified suffix from the end of the filename. For example, specifying `.tmpl` will cause the file `Settings.ini.tmpl` to be transformed into `Settings.ini`.

If omitted, the files will be transformed in-place.
